title: Reconnected tabs reopen at the end
author: pedroeloy
body_snippet:
<!--

<!-- Bug -->
|Detail|Value|
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7011.34996  |

1. Open 2 tab connections
2. Do a Reconnect on the first tab.
3. The reconnected tab loses its position and reopens at the end of ...

comments.snippet: Still occurs with the current dockpanelsuite tags
comments.author: kmscode
